channel.title: Skilling in Pking servers
channel.description:
[b]Behave normally but with a faster xp rate[/b]
Example: Catching swordies requires a fishing level of 50, and the experience rate of catching each one is increased to make leveling faster.
[b]No level requirement[/b]
Example: Catching swordies requires a fishing level of 50, no level requirement takes this away.
No....there is no [b]Give me everything option[/b]...you have to work to feed ur pking addiction, but obviously in the above example...decent pking food is given away with no limit but better food must be caught.
So would you skill away like normal on a pking server? or expect the level grind to be gone and only the farming remains?

item.title: Skilling in Pking servers
item.dc:creator: @OldSkoolRSC OldSkoolRSC
item.description:
@OldSkoolRSC wrote:

Ya no skilling in pking servers would be ideal, but it would fail. Your’ve always had 2 work for ur pking habit…whether farming gear…farming food or making ur own gear etc…its just a part of pking. The amount of time it takes tho is debateable.

Yeah i agree mapu. But a certain kind of pking server done just right…would pretty much achieve that with no level requirement skilling.

Read full topic

item.title: Skilling in Pking servers
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

In my opinion, after so many years of grinding i just want fish in my bank.

Read full topic

item.title: Skilling in Pking servers
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

should have an option saying no skilling in the poll

forgot to express my opinion

but i chose normally with faster xp as this was fun for a few moments in beyondrsc till xent messed it up

if there was an option for no i would choose that unless very certain circumstances were met

Read full topic
